instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.text: yea u! y are u so smiling so much?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.text: did u get to eat a yummy cake today? or did u see a cute puppy? if so where is it? i wanna see!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:alex
instances.text: *sigh* Rana, what are you talking about? He's not smiling, that's just his beard.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.text: whaaa? nooo ur lyingg he's just got a big ol' smile :)

instances.speaker: mcrpg:alex
instances.text: Rana, be real... it's a beard, just look at it.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:alex
instances.text: It IS a beard... r-right Steve?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:steve
instances.text: Eh, I'll just leave it up to your imaginations. It's whatever you guys want it to be!
